recommended_degree: Teknik Mesin, Teknik Bangunan Kapal, Teknik Konstruksi (Sarjana)
job_description:
- Support the review and preparation of scaffolding plans, sketches, and material lists.
- Assist in monitoring scaffolding erection and dismantling activities as part of field learning.
- Help ensure scaffold compliance with safety standards and engineering guidelines.
- Coordinate documentation related to scaffolding inspections and permits.
- Work with Scaffolding Supervisors and Inspectors to develop technical understanding.
